sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>PortfolioTokyoUpgrade</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var start = new GlideDateTime(); gs.log("Starting of PortfolioCoreTokyoUpgrade , time : "+start); var portfolioTHelper = new PortfolioTokyoUpgradeHelper(); portfolioTHelper.updateReferenceQualifierOnPortfolio('business_unit'); portfolioTHelper.updateReferenceQualifierOnPortfolio('department'); portfolioTHelper.updateDefaultValueOnPortfolio('business_unit'); portfolioTHelper.updateDefaultValueOnPortfolio('department'); var end = new GlideDateTime(); gs.log("Ending of PortfolioCoreTokyoUpgrade , time : "+end); gs.log("Total time taken for PortfolioCoreTokyoUpgrade in millisecs : "+(end.getNumericValue() - start.getNumericValue()));]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-06-24 08:52:35</sys_created_on> <sys_id>9c3286d9ebd011105509b5bf1a52289c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>PortfolioTokyoUpgrade</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Portfolio Management" source="com.snc.portfolio_management">b3ffcee747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43cf</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_9c3286d9ebd011105509b5bf1a52289c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-06-24 08:54:57</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
